editorialNotes.short: Learn to read and pronounce words with your new friend!
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to read with a friend

editorialNotes.standard: Nothing beats a kid-friendly game that keeps the whole family captivated—and Toca has us snipping, straightening, and styling to our heart's content. Once we've perfected our customer's silly new ‘dos, we make sure to add some accessories, snap a pic, and share the hair.

Learning the ABCs is child's play with this entertaining and educational app. Adorable artwork, colorful creatures, and smooth voice and sound effects enhance an already engaging hands-on experience that makes spelling each and every word an interactive puzzle.

editorialNotes.short: Try a wild new look – risk-free!

ios.subtitle: Make a routine & put on a show

editorialNotes.standard: Bursting with beats and energy, Toca Dance will make the whole family want to get up and groove. This incredibly cute game puts kids in charge of their own musical production—choosing dancers, costumes, and techno tracks, and choreographing moves using simple swipes and taps. Once the performance starts, the real fun begins: you can fling items at the stage, set off pyrotechnics and other cool effects, and even cheer (or boo) your squad. Seeing the payoff—an awesome video you can share—will encourage players to jump right back in and start working on their next great show.

editorialNotes.short: See internal organs in action: lungs breathe, muscles bend and nerves respond to a pinprick.

ios.subtitle: Be a vet and heal the animals

editorialNotes.standard: Fox and Sheep’s endearing app gives kids the power to heal—and helps parents encourage kindness and curiosity. Through trial and error, little ones figure out how to treat a sniffly owl, a sunburned rabbit, and other beautifully animated patients. Sometimes they need bandages and medicine; sometimes a healthy snack will do the trick. Animals’ flashbacks and reactions offer important clues in the delightful quest to make them smile again.

ios.subtitle: The fun way to learn to write

name: Star Walk 2 Pro: Sky Map Live

editorialNotes.standard: Discover the wonders of the universe with this powerful, easy-to-use astronomy toolkit. Just aim your device to view the real-time positions of planets, stars, constellations, and more in a stunning interactive map. Zoom in to explore Wikipedia articles, 3D models, and other media related to your favorite celestial bodies.
editorialNotes.short: Powerful astronomy toolkit to screen the night sky.
Interact with machines to understand physics.

editorialNotes.standard: Genetics can be tricky to explain, even for us so-called adults. DNA Play gently introduces kids to the concepts of cellular building blocks, letting youngsters create goofy monsters and mutate them on the fly by swapping around their genetic code. It’s great simply as a charming, colorful puzzle game to entertain the little ones, but has the added bonus of educating and enlightening budding young scientists.
editorialNotes.short: Tinker with genetics to create cute monsters.
Compose fun musical beats with amusing animals.

ios.subtitle: Build your city & play in it!

editorialNotes.short: Create a thriving metropolis and explore it.
editorialNotes.tagline: Build the city of your dreams

editorialNotes.standard: Kids (and kids at heart) can unleash their inner scientists with this captivatingly clever robot-creation kit, which features millions of different combinations for mechanical inventions. Whether you’re assembling a wheeled bot with laser guns for arms or a jolly jumping automaton with pogo-stick legs, taking your new bot on a walk through the woods will highlight the success—or the rough edges—of your design. While The Robot Factory teaches some nifty physics basics, we like to play around just for the pure fun of it.
editorialNotes.short: Design and experiment with all types of robots.
Create unique animal species and test their mobility.

editorialNotes.tagline: Build your own gears and engines

editorialNotes.standard: Slide a shape into the correct hole—easy, right? It is, at first. But what makes Busy Shapes so clever is the way it gently gets more challenging, motivating little kids to find solutions to each puzzle through experimentation. From shape-changing to color-mixing to hidden holes, we’re impressed with how the gameplay spurs out-of-the-box thinking, stimulating curious young minds.

The line never ends at Dr. Panda’s Ice Cream Truck, and that’s just how our kids like it. They jump at the chance to whip up new flavors and serve sky-high sundaes piled with toppings. Watching customers gobble down their desserts cracks them up every time (and us too).

ios.subtitle: Create to show what you know!

editorialNotes.standard: See the beauty and power of ABCs in an app where every letter holds secret words. Touch an F, and it sprouts a foot, then feathers, then a fan; a G becomes a guitar in a garden with ghosts. Kids will love poking and prodding their way to the end of the alphabet, while parents will dig the unpredictability and gorgeous animation in this Apple Design Award winner.
editorialNotes.short: Interactive alphabet learning where words and letters come to life.
Tour the planets in colourful 3D and track spacecraft.

ios.subtitle: Audio to help relax and sleep
Take your friends for a swim
All the universe in your hand!
